<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IndexReg = TargetReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use TargetReg to store displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a1b02eda9bb97934fbcc3d7f29219b931">EmitToStreamer</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a1b02eda9bb97934fbcc3d7f29219b931">EmitToStreamer</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstbuilder">MCInstBuilder</a>(SystemZ::ALGFI)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to emit &quot;j .+2&quot; for traps, jumping to the relative immediate field</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the jump instruction, which is an illegal instruction. We cannot emit a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;.&quot; symbol, so create and emit a temp label before the instruction and use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SystemZ::Trap: &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;emitLabel(DotSym);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr">MCConstantExpr</a> &#42;ConstExpr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr/#af9bdc4c9c65ea1ff077fbbb6407d7b2a">MCConstantExpr::create</a>(2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa7625af893e242d33b9f182066f59310">OutContext</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conditional traps will create a branch on condition instruction that jumps</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitNum = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SavedVRMask |= 1 &lt;&lt; (7 - BitNum);</span></CodeLine>
